name: Create new invoices in Xero from new deals in Pipedrive
description:
This template regularly checks for new deals entering a specific stage in Pipedrive and uses the retrieved information to create a new invoices in Xero. Your Pipedrive deal needs to have products associated with it.

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template by clicking the clock icon on the first module.
